title: phishing threats
extract: The most common type of phishing scam, deceptive phishing refers to any attack by which fraudsters impersonate a legitimate company and attempt to steal people's personal information or login credentials. Those emails frequently use threats and a sense of urgency to scare users into doing the attackers' bidding.Jun 5, 2016
extract_html: The most common type of phishing scam, deceptive phishing refers to any attack by which fraudsters impersonate a legitimate company and attempt to steal people's personal information or login credentials. Those emails frequently use threats and a sense of urgency to scare users into doing the attackers' bidding.Jun 5, 2016
